full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 221 of 236 1125 LC3Cmax7 Dawson - cross residence; isn't that right? MS. COMEY: Objection, your Honor. Beyond the scope. MR. EVERDELL: Your Honor, I'm going to prove up an inconsistent statement of a prior witness through this witness. THE COURT: You can confer and tell me if you need a sidebar. MR. EVERDELL: Understood, your Honor. (Pause) Your Honor, I think we do need a brief sidebar on this issue. (Continued on next page) SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018322
